title: The Burke and Wills Expedition 1860-1861 (MAC & PC)
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Burke, Robert O'Hara, 1821-1861
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Burke and Wills Expedition, (1860-1861)
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Multimedia systems
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Interactive media
description: Film producer and author David Corke, first presents the traditional story, then invites us to examine the original historic sources. How did Burke and Wills really die? Does the legend depicted in the story, film and pictures fit the facts? Includes multi-level presentations and commentary, historic diary extracts, articles and documents, useful and informative maps, facts about other famous Australian explorers and a detailed study guide with student activities.
